Remember that scene from The Nutty Professor when Eddie Murphy transformed back into Professor Klump, his mom kept fainting & his dad was like "If you keep dropping like that I'm not going to keep picking your ass back up"? That's what black women feel like in these elections.

Food court staff is trying to regulate my portions like a bartender tries to cut u off.
Her: "Are u sure u want TWO starches? I just don't want you to get diabetes" My brain: WOMAN IF YOU DONT LOAD THESE RECYCLABLE SEPARATE PORTION CONTAINERS W/ POTATOES & RICE. Me IRL: Yes plz

Pros and Cons of the two-week-long Red Line shutdown:
Con: Lost an hour of sleep getting to work. Con: Took twice as long to get home. Pro: Saw a wheelchair-bound man yell "I can do what I wanna do. I'm a pimp!" at a bus driver.
@SHS_2015_1997 I was surprised, too
Hospital sushi: It's not a gas station but you're still rolling the dice.
